posts.post_title: WTB: Chase Pink Portrait/D Taylor/Waddell Off-Backs
posts.post_content:
Hey gang: 

Looking to add graded off-backs of the following:

2. Rube Waddell Portrait or Throwing

Thanks in advance and hope everyone is having a great weekend!

-Beth
